price: Wͻnnye nni kͻpem sε wͻbɛhunu asotwee yaaya no ansa.
arabic: لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِهِۦ حَتَّىٰ يَرَوُاْ ٱلۡعَذَابَ ٱلۡأَلِيمَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: lā yu'minūna bihi ḥattā yarawū al-ʿadhāba al-alīma
